title: Mana Flow Band Bug
body:
So, I was playing a game as Anivia using the new manaflow band because MANA YES.

After the first use of my ultimate...
Manaflow band stopped stacking at 150 mana.

Maybe it has something to do with toggable ults, but it was pretty annoying, since it happened right after I reached level 6.

I dunno, I just needed to point this out since it was pretty big.

replies.body: Aware of this one, fixing ASAP. Has to do with champions that res (Anivia, Karthus).
Is it possible that Presence of Mind has similar issues? Yesterday when I played Karthus I often didn't get a refund after ulting in passive and getting assists from that, or isn't this how it works?

I had the same problem in a Karthus game, only mine stopped at 50 mana. I think it might also have something to do with Post Death passives.

did you die at 150 stacks?
I died at 200 and it broke dont know about regen part after 250 mana tho

To be honest, I didn't really notice.  Baiting in fools with her passive has become such a habit to me that I don't think about it too much.
If the red post above is any indication, this is most likely the actual cause then.

I played  a training mode today to get a feel of  manaflow band and, the % regen mana was unoticable, like, even with alot of mana i felt like it didn't regen any more then what i had base. or is it cause its not counted in the blue line 1.8 per sec kinda thing. cause it went from 1.8 to 1.9 maybe ( or was it level )  ?
